column1: Little Goat Diner////I wanted an iced coffee drink and the Thailander looked interesting on the menu. Sadly
column2: I can only say it was ehh and probably a bit too experimental for my tastes. The chile flavor is quite prominent on the after taste and just didn't work for me. Overall though
column3: the food is amazing and would love to come back sometime to try more of Little Goat's delicious offerings.
